Slave Matrix

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 312
(communion-slave [comslave])

Requires 5E5S to forge (E1S1)

The Slave Matrix opens the bearer's mind so that his power can be used by another mage. The effect is similar to that of the Communion Slave spell. This item is only useful for mages because non mages cannot help in a communion.
